title: OT111: Ophion Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author made some mistakes and received new insights about schizophrenia from the comments on a previous post.
- There were discussions on the subreddit about the economy of Britain and useless jobs.
- There is a South Bay meetup on October 6th.

Key learnings:
- Negative symptoms can come before or at the same time as positive symptoms in schizophrenia.
- There is a population of people with schizophrenia who never worsen regardless of treatment.
- There are factors about psychosis that do not fit the author's previous model.

Key questions:
- None mentioned explicitly in this portion of the post.
